ExploreFact.Text: I woke up in a void filled with stars after losing consciousness. A strange white crystal, a couple other glowing crystals, and this system's Sun were also there.
The stars started to disappear until the Sun was the only remaining star. Shortly afterwards the Sun also died, leaving me in complete darkness.
A lone house on the pole of the planet. There is a hole in the floor that leads to a dark cave.

RumorFact.Text: I found a cave underneath a house that appears to lead further underground.

ExploreFact.Text: A strange, white crystal in a large chamber at the center of the planet. It emits a signal on the Electromagnetic Waves frequency.
A pillar of crystal emerged from the ground after I entered the room. The Crystal Heart started transmitting some sort of data into the pillar.
When I walked into the stream of data, it showed me a vision of what looked like the past and the future.

RumorFact.Text: I saw a dark tunnel leading out of the central chamber marked by a cairn with a crystal.

ExploreFact.Text: An old building filled with machinery and crystals. There are a couple crystals that are cut and placed in containers.
I found a lantern in the corner by some drawings. The drawings show someone lighting the lantern by pointing it at either a fire or the sun.

RumorFact.Text: I saw a dark tunnel leading out of the central chamber marked by a cairn with a circle of lines.

ExploreFact.Text: An old building with a strange table in the center.
I found some drawings on the wall showing someone placing a crystal on the table. The crystal then starts glowing.
When I placed an unlit crystal on the table, it began to glow.

RumorFact.Text: I saw a dark tunnel leading out of the central chamber marked by a cairn with a book.

ExploreFact.Text: An old building filled with papers and books.
There is a locked door at the back of the building. There is an empty socket near it that has a drawing of a glowing lantern.
I found a strange diagram behind the locked door. It showed three glowing crystals- red, blue, and purple- in three different shapes surrounding a large circle.

RumorFact.Text: I saw a dark tunnel leading out of the central chamber marked by a cairn with three circles.

ExploreFact.Text: An old building with a large table at the center. The table has a large circle in the center surrounded by a 5-sided shape, a 6-sided shape, and a 7-sided shape.

I found a drawing on the wall showing someone placing an item in the center of the table. The three shapes surrounding the center circle have labels that I can't read. The item that was placed in the center then appears to glow.
